DOC.criteria: Patients admit The National Taiwan University Hospital 2003/1/1~2008/12/31 follow discharge diagnosis : myoglobinuria , rhabdomyolysis , myopathy , toxic myopathy , malignant hyperthermia , neuroleptic malignant syndrome , polymyositis , myalgia acute neuromuscular illness presentation serum creatinine kinase ( CK ) 5 time upper limit normal ( male > 900 IU/L ; female > 835 IU/L ) . Patients recent myocardial infarction stroke , unless clinical history , examination , electromyography show concomitant myopathy .
